description: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.Blob's origins are mysterious, but he rolled up at the right place and the right time to be the hero that the Color Underground was looking for. Music surrounds him and color energy flows through him; with his touch Blob can literally make the world a better place. Blob represents individuality and determination.  Blob is good hearted but lazy. He is often late, but he always comes through.

Music surrounds him and color energy flows through him; with his touch Blob can literally make the world a better place. Blob represents individualityand determination. Blob is good hearted but lazy. He is often late, but he always comes through.
title: de Blob 2
